com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity

Class ErpCommand<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand<T>
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.frameworks.hystrix.Command<T>
        • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity.ErpCommand<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixExecutable<T>, com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixInvokable<T>, com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixInvokableInfo<T>, com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixObservable<T>, WithErpEndpoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BapiQueryCommand, RfcQueryCommand

    public abstract class ErpCommand<T>
extends Command<T>
implements WithErpEndpoint
    Extends a common hystrix-based Command to enable resilient execution of S/4HANA queries. Adds S/4HANA specific context: endpoint and configuration context.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand
